entries.notes: in Boccherini's autograph catalogue (for comment, see No. 189). Third movement includes (Trio) section for Va with dol. marking

ms_copies_parts: Naples, Conservatorio. Two copies: 22.5.2, and 22.5.6, 'Quartetto no. 4...'
Paris, Conservatoire, a parcel of copies (see No. 189)
sources.first_edition: (1778?), Paris, Sieber: Op. 27 no. 4 (for title, see No. 191)
later_editions: (c. 1785?), Amsterdam, Hummel: Op. 11 no. 4 (for title, see No. 191)
sources.modern_edition: 1953, Milan, Ricordi: Op. 27 no. 4 (pocket score; revised by Enrico Polo); The order of the movements is different: Allegro—Larghetto—Minuetto
